sub_title: Head of Credit Risk - ING Belgium | Supervisory Board - Limburgs Museum | Guest professor of Finance - Erasmus University
summary:
Addicted to solving complex questions.

Seasoned risk & finance professional with experience in leading global transformation programs. Hands-on experience in Finance & Control, Treasury & Financial Markets, Credit Risk (wholesale, business lending and retail), Integrated Risk, Compliance and Non-Financial Risk. Secretary of the executive risk leaderhip team chaired by the group CRO from 2018 until 2021. International experience in Belgium, Singapore and United States.

Personal: guest professor of finance, father of two daughters, husband, multi-instrumentalist and avid sporter
